Checks whether value is near to zero within a tolerance.
static Vector3 onlyX (this Vector3 vector3)
Returns a copy of given vector with only X component of the vector.
static Vector3 onlyY (this Vector3 vector3)
Returns a copy of given vector with only Y component of the vector.
static Vector3 onlyZ (this Vector3 vector3)
Returns a copy of given vector with only Z component of the vector.
static Vector3 onlyXZ (this Vector3 vector3)
Returns a copy of given vector with only X and Z components of the vector.
static bool isZero (this Vector3 vector3)
Checks whether vector is near to zero within a tolerance.
static bool isExceeding (this Vector3 vector3, float magnitude)
Checks whether vector is exceeding the magnitude within a small error tolerance.
static Vector3 normalized (this Vector3 vector3, out float magnitude)
Returns a copy of given vector with a magnitude of 1, and outs its magnitude before normalization.
static Vector3 clamped (this Vector3 vector3, out float magnitude)
Returns a copy of given vector with its magnitude clamped to 0 and 1, and outs its magnitude before clamp.
static Vector3 clampedTo (this Vector3 vector3, float maxLength)
Returns a copy of given vector with its magnitude clamped to maxLength.
static Vector3 relativeTo (this Vector3 vector3, Transform target, bool onlyLateral=true)
Transform a given vector to be relative to target transform.

static Vector3 Vector3Common.relativeTo (this Vector3 vector3, Transform target, bool onlyLateral = true )[static]

Eg: Use to perform movement relative to camera's view direction.
